name: Platfighter
description:
This is a platforming fighting game made for Ludum Dare 41. Its is a fun multiplayer game with 4 maps to play on.
To win you need to have the most platforms in the map be your colour before the timer gets to 60.

WARNING!
Sadly, this game does not have a singleplayer mode. We werent able to get bots in the game before the deadline.

CONTROLS

The red player uses the W A S and D keys and the blue player uses the arrow keys. Be sure to play the in-game tutorial.

Have fun!
